content: the briar cardigan is slouchy oversized with loose wide sleeves and simple hemline ribbing it s the perfect crochet cardi for chilly fall days as the relaxed fit allows you to wear heaps of layers underneath this design also features two handy dandy pockets that fit a full-sized smartphone inside worked up in half double double front and back post double_crochet the briar cardigan is a wonderful easy crochet cardigan pattern that is great for first time garment makers this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
